name: Logic Code
description:
Buy the iPhone version and get the AppleTV version for FREE! When you buy the iPhone version of Logic Code it will appear in your purchased apps on AppleTV if you have the same iTunes account on both devices. Crack the code at home and on the go!

Our version of the classic Super Mastermind. EIGHT colors, FIVE peg holes for even more mind bending possibilities.

Not only very challenging but also very addictive. Practice your skills and see if you can solve it in four rows! Our personal record is three :-)

See if you can solve it faster than all your friends.

Great exercise for your brain and hones logical reasoning skills.
